documents.document: Absolutely loving that #Inside is getting some love at the #SelectAwards2016
Alright @IGN_AU let's do this... https://t.co/afddkHbYJ0
I have a sudden urge to watch that episode of #TheSimpsons where they visit Australia
@ChaosKittyEm @LuckyBonez Oh don't you worry, awkwardness will be in abundance
@ChaosKittyEm So I can expect to see you and @LuckyBonez all suited up at RTX then?
Oh sh*t yes, absolutely cannot wait to get my hands on #HorizonZeroDawn And now that I've said that, I can only be disappointed...
Not sure whether this is a good thing or not. I mean, there's only so much raging I can do in a game of #Overwatch https://t.co/xpeytxqjqX
Holy sh*t, absolutely cannot wait for the next #BanjoKazooie game to be released! https://t.co/nDCmfBYEEC
End of an era that's for sure. #GoodGame https://t.co/xJvy5431my
Oh damn, now this is completely unexpected https://t.co/PmEswBq8Hs
Damn, I would've played the sh*t out of this had it been completed as #Fallout 3 and not as Icewind Dale https://t.co/Uq43lIVCOq
Could it actually be...? Could #Skate4 indeed be a reality? https://t.co/YLuogzn3v2
Not the outcome I wanted, but credit to #Federer for winning the #AusOpen. Great stuff after being out for half a year.
#Fedal2017 #AusOpen final, here we go....
1 week in and we have a #MuslimBan. Oh boy, can't wait for what #Trump has in store for week 2.
@TheRileyLittle is there a unicorn pink option?
Just as I'm coming down from that #NadalvsDimitrov high, I found out that #Manor is gone from #F1 Back to 20 cars on the grid...
Holy sh*t, awesome stuff from #Nadal & #Dimitrov. But the bigger news is that we now have that #Fedal #AusOpen final we've been waiting for!
Damn, some great hitting early on at the #AusOpen from #Nadal and #Dimitrov
Sooooo much good stuff to get in the new #Overwatch #YearOfTheRooster event https://t.co/6HrdPAP5xA
Great stuff from #Nadal. One step closer to that #Fedal #AusOpen final...
@ChaosKittyEm I yelled at my phone when I found out #YourName wasn't nominated. #TheRedTurtle getting a nom slightly made up for it
Speaking of stupid #OscarNoms, can the Academy get over its wanky love of #MerylStreep? She's great and all, but #AmyAdams deserved the nom
I'm happy that #TheRedTurtle got an #OscarNom but nothing for #YourName? Of all the stupid things the #Oscars have done, this is the worst
I mean, #TheLastJedi isn't a bad title per se, but it kind of pales in comparison to the fake ones like "The Order of the Dark Side"
#Inside was one of my favourite games of 2016 so I really can't wait to see how this turns out https://t.co/W4bO156L9p
It's only taken 2 years, but it's great to see #Nadal back in the #AusOpen quarters. Now to look forward to his match against #Raonic
We're only in January, but the bar for op-eds is already ridiculously high https://t.co/j4i3cBpOLl
Great stuff from #Federer but sad that #Nishikori was hampered. At the way this #AusOpen is going, a #Fedal could very well happen again...
Wow, top 2 seeds out in the 1st week of the #AusOpen I mean, we joke about it, sure. But for it to actually happen? Absolutely mindboggling
Yikes, #AndyMurray in some serious trouble at the #AusOpen Could the elder #Zverev do what his little bro just missed out on doing?
Awesome stuff from #Nadal and #Zverev at the #AusOpen, glad to see the champ move on but expecting to see some great things from the kid
Jesus, #Federer is looking absolutely ominous. The Fed v #Nishikori match is going to be an absolute cracker.
Time to revisit the world of #FFXV me thinks... #FFXVCarnival https://t.co/qOrGcMDG5S
Having watched both #Logan trailers quite a few times now, I'm definitely getting some sort of Joel & Ellie vibe with #Wolverine & the girl
And with #SystemShock3 in development, we can have both! https://t.co/AlGaaRwhls
Full credit to Istomin, he held his nerve when it really mattered. Now he needs to back this up and win the #AustralianOpen!
Wow, #Djokovic out in R2 of the #AustralianOpen I'm now wondering if I look out my window I'll see cats flying or something else crazy
Holy sh*t, 1 point away...
I've seen #Djokovic play better at the #AustralianOpen but credit where it's due, Istomin is winning this rather than Djokovic losing it.
#Djokovic down a break in the 5th set in R2 at the #AustralianOpen Oh yep, this report is just in, it is indeed now snowing in hell.
I have a hunch he saw those #Overwatch Jeff meme videos... https://t.co/8Xx65iUBSS
So I wrote a little something on the #StudioGhibli museum today. Now I want to revisit that magical place again... https://t.co/i9IYWCEomK
#keinishikori taken to 5, #Kerber taken to 3, #Wawrinka in the 5th & #Federer back after months out. God I love the #AustralianOpen
Sweet, now I can show off all my mad #Overwatch highlights where I stupidly kill myself & somehow manage to take 4… https://t.co/mSJuK0fF84
Props to @PlayOverwatch & @Blizzard_Ent for this. Now if only they can ban that 1 toxic player on my team who plays… https://t.co/T65ObnbQqn

I don't need this. I really don't need this.
....I need this. https://t.co/Hlfj7t5h7X
A shout out to my man @DrJ_SBSPopAsia who is leaving us at #SBSPopAsia for better pastures elsewhere. Will miss having you around buddy!
Maybe it's #BreathOfTheWild, #SuperMarioOdyssey or #XenobladeChronicles2 (or all 3). Whatever it is, looks like I'll be getting a #Switch...
The #NintendoSwitch presentation was meh, but I still want one. God damn it.
#Deadpool's PGA nom means it has a chance of an Oscar nom. God I hope it gets it because I want to see @VancityReynolds turn up as Deadpool
Holy sh*t, does this mean what I think it means for season 3 of #BetterCallSaul!?!? https://t.co/GtGLP1O1sb
This is good news for all those #Sombra & #Roadhog players out there. For us Ana players, a little bit less so. https://t.co/UsRyCWtxX3
This #Scalebound debacle sucks for all - fans lose out, developers lose 3+ years of work & their health, & Microsof… https://t.co/Mu31aW7WKh
I lost a bunch of #Overwatch matches, but then I saw @VancityReynolds & #AndrewGarfield kiss, & everything was suddenly right in the world
Slightly disappointed, but I'm all for it if it means they will finish the next #ElderScrolls/#Fallout game faster. https://t.co/k3OuvJDpZG
Leave it to #LaLaLand to save the #GoldenGlobes, from the opening monologue to winning everything. That & Meryl Streep being awesome.
@TheRileyLittle @cm_GG Don't be like that, Mr Little. Someone has to take 1 for the team, & who better to drink all the diet coke than you?
@cm_GG awww shucks, nicest thing anyone has said to me...
@TheRileyLittle @cm_GG I may not agree with Mr Little's Diet Coke drinking tendencies, but you MUST watch #CowboyBebop, Mr Gravelle!
Rewatching #Watchmen for the 1st time since I saw it in the cinema 7.5 years ago. Let's see how well it has held up over time
@cm_GG What can I say, FF15 brings out the best & worst in me. I still get twitches every time I think about that Pitioss Dungeon *shudders*
Definitely a case of what might have been if #FFXV was given another 10 years of development time. https://t.co/NKrG6mO51S
Sad to see @rhipratchett go, but excited for what she works on next https://t.co/sGlrtajS8x
@TheRileyLittle It sucks. (I lie, Oasis is pretty cool).
Damn. The #Overwatch Winter Event is over and all I'm missing from my collection is the #Nutcracker Zenyatta skin...
2 hours later, I finally beat that fu*king Adamantoise in #FFXV. Not sure if it was time well spent.
1 hour into the #FFXV Adamantoise fight. No end in sight.
Can't deny that the guy had a big year. https://t.co/7UVRE8AP0N
Welp, I bit the curb (so to speak) and watched American History X. Gripping & intense stuff from Ed Norton. Enough to overshadow any flaws.
Welp that was 12 mins of nonstop #nye2016 fireworks. Honestly, they aren't that different to any other fireworks display I've seen....
5 mins to spare, but @andy_trieu & I managed to get a decent view of the fireworks #SydNYE https://t.co/zqhP1nzGYd
Aaaaand with just hours left before the new year, 2016 claims another victim in Ronda Rousey. Kudos, 2016, kudos.
I'd watch this. https://t.co/NIsGP4rUNQ
Guess that means it is time for a #Dishonored replay. https://t.co/LgLwGP1RSB
Jesus fu*king Christ, 2016 is not finishing quietly is it.... https://t.co/LIZDdeNrBz
Finally saw #HellOrHighWater & #KuboAndTheTwoStrings There have been some sh*t films & some fantastic films in 2016 - these are the latter.
Never thought I would be saying this so soon and it breaks my heart saying it, but may the force be with you, Carrie.
Good fu*king grief, 2016, haven't you taken enough from us already? #RIPCarrie #CarrieFisher
Oh, so people didn't like the #AssassinsCreed movie? What a surprise. In other news, water is wet. https://t.co/vIrYZytlJe
Now this #FFXV Christmas story is just too heartwarming for words. https://t.co/8qJLBb6PXN
Aaaaand now we're reminded that 2016 STILL ain't over yet... #GeorgeMichael
Merry Christmas to all and if everything goes well, I'll have more to announce soon!
Have something exciting in the works. Can't reveal much atm but here's a little #Overwatch teaser of what's coming,… https://t.co/zK595e9v9t
@HurdyIV Well since you asked https://t.co/Pva6f0mmnB
Just finished #Inside again. Still absolutely beautiful. Love how there's not a word & yet it still has a better story than #Uncharted4
Big news about Tracer - she doesn't need to wear her chronal accelerator 24/7! Oh, and she also has a girlfriend. https://t.co/rjvtfZ9pra
Can't we just accept that #Overwatch comic for what it is - a moving short story ft. Tracer as a selfless badass & a lonely Winston
Genuinely surprised at the amount of attention over Tracer's sexuality and whatnot in the new #Overwatch comic.
Goddamn it #Overwatch, why must you bring tears to my eyes with your latest Tracer comic?
I mean, why not? https://t.co/ZX7oGtkr1F
Oh, so the #AssassinsCreed movie is sh*t? In other news, the sky is blue & #DonaldTrump has the intelligence of a 5 yr old handicapped kid
I've yet to finish all the side stuff in #FF15 and they're already giving us more stuff. What a great problem to ha… https://t.co/E8j8Q0dI5F
The 1st 2/3 of #RogueOne was quite the slog, but boy did they almost redeem it with that 3rd act
Alright #RogueOne let's see if you are a POS, a masterpiece, or something in between.
Great #FF15 piece by my buddy @cm_GG and quite possibly one of the few things I wholeheartedly agree with him on. https://t.co/SLycb9VZSq
Leave it to a fan to make an AR Pokemon game that's better than #PokemonGO https://t.co/qojUFXuatn
Probably won't happen soon, but it would be nice. https://t.co/Flg7tkqmlw
Not jumping on the bandwagon or anything, but the #BIGBANGMADEFullAlbum is pretty fXXking amazing... https://t.co/bf7fm8d545
Watched #YourName again. Just as beautiful as the first time, but with twice the amount of tears shed.
